CollectionResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing IEnumerable<T> collection resolution between source-gen and reflection. Measures the cost of resolving all implementations of an interface. Common pattern for plugin systems, handlers, and strategy patterns. Manual DI is the baseline.

CreatePluginsFromGenericTypeBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing GeneratedPluginFactory vs ReflectionPluginFactory for creating plugins from a type parameter. Uses REAL generated TypeRegistry from source generator. Reflection is the baseline.

DecoratorResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing decorated service resolution between source-gen and reflection. All benchmarks measure resolution of a service with a 5-decorator chain. Manual DI is the baseline.

DeepDependencyChainBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing resolution of services with deep dependency chains. Tests a 10-level deep dependency graph where each level depends on the previous. Real applications often have complex dependency graphs; this measures scaling behavior. Manual DI is the baseline.

DependentServiceResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing service resolution with dependencies between source-gen and reflection. All benchmarks measure resolution of a service with 3 dependencies. Manual DI is the baseline.

FirstResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing first/cold-start service resolution between source-gen and reflection. Measures the cost of the very first resolution before any caching kicks in. Critical for serverless, AOT, and cold-start scenarios. Each iteration builds a fresh container to ensure cold resolution. Manual DI is the baseline.

HostBuildBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing host build with source-gen vs reflection DI. Measures full host building time including service registration. Manual DI is the baseline.

KeyedServiceResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing keyed service resolution between source-gen and reflection. All benchmarks measure resolution of a keyed service. Manual DI is the baseline.

OpenGenericBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing open generic service resolution between source-gen and reflection. Tests the IRepository<T> pattern common in enterprise applications. Measures the cost of resolving closed generic types from open generic registrations. Uses pre-registration callbacks to register open generics before auto-discovery. Manual DI is the baseline.

OptionsResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing IOptions resolution between source-gen and reflection. All benchmarks measure resolution of a single options type. Manual DI is the baseline.

ProviderBuildBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks measuring the complete path from scratch to a type that can resolve services. Baseline: Manual registration → IServiceProvider Needlr Reflection: Syringe reflection → IServiceProvider Needlr Source Gen: Syringe source gen → IServiceProvider Needlr Provider: Syringe source gen + resolve provider → ISingleServiceProvider

ProviderFactoryResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing factory resolution through providers. Measures the time to invoke a factory method from different sources.

ProviderResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing service resolution approaches. Measures the time to resolve a type from a pre-built provider. Baseline: Manual registration + ServiceProvider.GetService Needlr Reflection: Syringe reflection + ServiceProvider.GetService Needlr Source Gen: Syringe source gen + ServiceProvider.GetService Provider Interface: Source gen provider property access Provider Shorthand: Source gen shorthand provider property access

ScopedServiceResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing scoped service resolution between source-gen and reflection. Measures the cost of creating a scope and resolving scoped services within it. This is critical for web applications where each request creates a new scope. Manual DI is the baseline.

ServiceProviderBuildBenchmarks.description: End-to-end benchmarks comparing full Syringe pipeline for source-gen vs reflection. Uses REAL generated TypeRegistry from source generator. Manual DI is the baseline.

SimpleServiceResolutionBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing simple service resolution between source-gen and reflection. All benchmarks measure resolution of a simple service (no dependencies). Manual DI is the baseline.

TypeRegistrationBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing GeneratedTypeRegistrar vs ReflectionTypeRegistrar. Uses REAL generated TypeRegistry from source generator. Manual DI is the baseline.

WebApplicationBuildBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks comparing ASP.NET WebApplication build with source-gen vs reflection DI. Measures full WebApplication building time including service registration. Manual DI is the baseline.
